'''Way of the Strong''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Mixed Yakisoba]] with [[Arataki Itto]].

Way of the Strong revives a character and restores '''15'''% of Max HP, then restores an additional '''550''' HP.
